section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Collar" means a device constructed of nylon, leather, or similar material specifically designed to be used around the neck of a dog.
"Restraint" means a chain, rope, tether, leash, cable, or other device that attaches a dog to a stationary object or trolley system.

text.section: A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 90 days or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both.
